output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF 11240017" is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda material
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid Facebook/Instagram post targeting a potential audience of 100,001-500,000 people
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Promotes PSD's governance program - Highlights Marcel Ciolacu's role as Prime Minister and his government's achievements - Uses campaign slogan "#caleasigurapentruromania" - Discusses electoral promises about income growth
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly a campaign message, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a structured campaign message with official CMF number
Additional context: - The post is paid for by "Infomed Pro SRL" - It's targeting both current governance achievements and future promises - Uses campaign specific hashtags and messaging

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Promotes a presidential candidate (Ciolacu) - Makes electoral promises - Uses campaign slogans - Is paid advertising reaching a wide audience
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, prin promovarea unui material electoral platit pe Facebook si Instagram (ID: 448675854942347) care il promoveaza pe candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu, continand numar CMF (11240017), folosind sloganuri de campanie si facand promisiuni electorale despre cresterea veniturilor. Materialul are un evident caracter de propaganda electorala, fiind difuzat dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, folosind hashtag-ul de campanie "#caleasigurapentruromania" si promovand masurile guvernului condus de candidatul prezidential, cu scopul clar de a influenta alegatorii in favoarea acestuia.
